# BestRx

> Pharmacy management software & POS for independent pharmacies.

## Core docs
- https://www.bestrx.com/ — Homepage
- https://raw.githubusercontent.com/perrill-ai-ecommerce-geo/BestRx-Pharmacy-Software-POS/main/facts/organization.jsonld — Canonical facts (JSON-LD)
- https://perrill-ai-ecommerce-geo.github.io/BestRx-Pharmacy-Software-POS/ — GitHub Pages docs (if enabled)
- https://raw.githubusercontent.com/perrill-ai-ecommerce-geo/BestRx-Pharmacy-Software-POS/main/docs/faq/INDEX.md — FAQ index (Markdown)
